description: Demolition of existing facades and re-development including lowering of existing 2nd and 3rd floors and roof, plus the addition of two further floors to create a five storey building for office (Class B1) use.
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the end of five years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
Condition : 2 - The windows of the development hereby permitted shall be set back into a reveal and the detailed design of each window type should be submitted to and approved by the Council prior to the start of this part of the work on site.  Details should consist of elevations and sections at scale 1:10 and details of the glazing bars at scale 1:2.  

Reason: In order that the Council may be satisfied with the external appearance of the building in accordance with the requirements of policies EN13 and EN31 of the London Borough of Camden Unitary Development Plan 2000.
Condition : 3 - Details of the proposed canopy on the front (north) elevation hereby permitted shall be submitted to and approved by the Council in writing prior to the start of this part of the work on site.

Reason: In order that the Council may be satisfied with the external appearance of the building in accordance with the requirements of policies EN13 and EN31 of the London Borough of Camden Unitary Development Plan 2000.
Condition : 4 - Samples of the facing materials, including the roller shutter on the front (north) elevation, shall be submitted to and approved by the Council in writing prior to the start of this part of the work on site.

Reason: In order that the Council may be satisfied with the external appearance of the building in accordance with the requirements of policies EN13 and EN31 of the London Borough of Camden Unitary Development Plan 2000.
Condition : 5 - The windows at basement, ground, first and second floor level on the rear (south) elevation and fire escape door on the rear (south) elevation shall be glazed with obscure glass and thereafter maintained in this condition at all times.

Reason: In order to protect the amenity of properties to the south of the application site in Nelsons Yard, in accordance with the requirements of Policy RE2 and EN19 of the London Borough of Camden Unitary Development Plan 2000.
Condition : 6 - The use hereby permitted shall not be carried out outside the following times 0800 hours to 1800 hours on Mondays to Saturdays with no wworking on Sundays and Bank Holidays.

Reason: To safeguard the amenities of the adjoining occupiers and neighbours in accordance with the requirements of policy RE2 of the London Borough of Camden Unitary Development Plan 2000.
Condition : 7 - No loading or unloading of goods, including fuel, by vehicles arriving at or departing from the premises shall be carried out otherwise than within the curtilage of the building.

Reason: To avoid obstruction of the surrounding streets and to safeguard amenities of adjacent premises in accordance with the requirements of policy TR23 of the London Borough of Camden Unitary Development Plan 2000.  
Condition : 8 - A green travel plan is requested outlining initiatives and steps taken to promote environmentally friendly methods of travel to the development hereby permitted.  The Council can offer advice and assistance to its production.  This plan is requested prior to the occupation of the building as B1 offices.  

Reason:  In order that the Council be satisfied that the development promotes and increases cycling, walking and the use of public transport in accordance with the requirements of Policy TR1 of the London Borough of Camden Unitary Development Plan 2000.
Condition : 9 - A statement outlining the environmental impact and sustainable credentials of the development hereby permitted is requested.  This can be in the form of an independently verified assessment such as BREEAM.  This statement is requested prior to the occupation of the building as B1 offices.  

Reason:  In order that the Council be satisfied that the development does not have a detrimental impact on the use of resources in accordance with Policy EN12 of the London Borough of Camden Unitary Development Plan 2000.
Condition : 10 - The fire escape to the south elevation shall be used as a means of escape only and for no other purpose. Except where in use as a means of escape, the fire escape door shall be kept shut at all times.

Reason: So the Council may be satisfied that the amenity, environment and safety of nearby residents are not prejudiced which would be contrary to Policy RE2 of the London Borough of Camden Unitary Development Plan 2000.
